briefTitle: Periocline as an Adjunct to Scaling and Root Planing for Adult Periodontitis

armGroups.label: Scaling and root planing + SHAM TX

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* moderate to severe periodontitis

Exclusion Criteria:

* recent periodontal therapy
* certain medical or dental conditions
* pregnancy
* allergy to active drug or related drugs

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Pocket Depth.
outcomeMeasures.description: Average change of Pocket Depth at 9 months from baseline

commonTop: Gerenal Disorders and adminstration site conditions
